messages.text: motherCluck - This chatroom is pretty cool
lil' clucker - Just type your message in the box at the top, and when you hit return it will show up as a new message at the bottom!
Cluck boy - To remove your message, click the delete button next to your message
Cluck Daddy - If you want to clear all messages, click the 'clear messages' button next to the text box
babyDontCluckMe - Try it out and enjoy uClucker!
